languages.text: "Ан... комендант... мой друг. Я хотел уговорить его остановить мятеж. Неудачная вышла... дипломатия..." {n}— он говорит с трудом, но упрямо продолжает.{/n} "Отец ненавидит дипломатию. Так что я тем более... должен был попытаться!"

"An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"
languages.original_text: "Ан... комендант... мой друг. Я хотел уговорить его остановить мятеж. Неудачная вышла... дипломатия..." {n}— он говорит с трудом, но упрямо продолжает.{/n} "Отец ненавидит дипломатию. Так что я тем более... должен был попытаться!"

traits.locale_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}The talking is taking a toll on him, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

"An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

languages.text: “是安……典狱长……我的朋友。我试着说服他停止这场暴动，但外交手段……失败了……”{n}尽管他说出的每句话都很痛苦，但他依然固执地继续说着。{/n}“父亲痛恨外交手段，所以我才……必须试一试！”
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: “是安……典狱长……我的朋友。我试着说服他停止这场暴动，但外交手段……失败了……”{n}尽管他说出的每句话都很痛苦，但他依然固执地继续说着。{/n}“父亲痛恨外交手段，所以我才……必须试一试！”

languages.text: 「所長の…アンは…我が友なんだ。俺は暴動を止めようと彼の説得を試みたのだが…交渉は失敗に終わった…」{n}絞り出すように話しながら、彼は頑なに言葉を続ける。{/n}「我が父は交渉事を嫌っている。だからこそ…俺が成さねばならなかった！」
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: 「アン…監視員は…我が友だったのです。私は暴動を止めようと説得を試みましたが…失敗に終わりました…」{n}絞り出すように話しながら、彼は言葉を頑なに続ける。{/n}「父は外交交渉を嫌っています。だからこそ…私は為さねばならなかった！」
「所長の…アンは…我が友なんだ。俺は暴動を止めようと彼の説得を試みたのだが…交渉は失敗に終わった…」{n}絞り出すように話しながら、彼は頑なに言葉を続ける。{/n}「我が父は交渉事を嫌っている。だからこそ…俺が成さねばならなかった！」

languages.text: "An ... der Wächter ... mein Freund. Ich wollte ihn davon überzeugen, den Aufstand zu beenden. Die Diplomatie ... hat versagt ..." {n}Das Sprechen bereitet ihm Mühe, aber er fährt stur fort:{/n} "Vater hasst Diplomatie. Darum musste ich ... es versuchen!"
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: "An ... der Wächter ... mein Freund. Ich wollte ihn davon überzeugen, den Aufstand zu beenden. Die Diplomatie ... hat versagt ..." {n}Das Sprechen bereitet ihm Mühe, aber er fährt stur fort:{/n} "Vater hasst Diplomatie. Darum musste ich ... es versuchen!"

languages.text: « An... Le directeur... Mon ami. J'ai tenté de le convaincre de mettre un terme aux émeutes. La diplomatie... a échoué. » {n}Sa diction est laborieuse, mais il poursuit avec obstination :{/n} « Père déteste la diplomatie. C'est pour cela... que je devais essayer ! »
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: « An... Le directeur... Mon ami. J'ai tenté de le convaincre de mettre un terme aux émeutes. La diplomatie... a échoué. » {n}Sa diction est laborieuse, mais il poursuit avec obstination :{/n} « Père déteste la diplomatie. C'est pour cela... que je devais essayer ! »

languages.text: «An... El alcaide... Mi amigo. Intenté convencerle para que detuviera la revuelta. La diplomacia... no ha funcionado». {n}Aunque le cuesta mucho hablar, continúa testarudamente.{/n} «Mi padre odia la diplomacia. Por eso mismo... ¡tenía que intentarlo!».
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: «An... El alcaide... Mi amigo. Intenté convencerle para que detuviera la revuelta. La diplomacia... no ha funcionado». {n}Aunque le cuesta mucho hablar, continúa testarudamente.{/n} «Mi padre odia la diplomacia. Por eso mismo... ¡tenía que intentarlo!».

languages.text: "An... Müdür... Dostumdu. İsyanı durdurması için onu ikna etmeye çalıştım. Diplomasi çabalarım... Başarısız oldu." {n}Konuşmakta zorlanıyor ama inatla devam ediyor.{/n} "Babam diplomasiden nefret eder. İşte o yüzden... Denemek zorundaydım!"
languages.original_text: "An... The warden... My friend. I tried to convince him to stop the riot. Diplomacy... failed..." {n}Speaking is a struggle, but he continues stubbornly,{/n} "Father hates diplomacy. Which is why I... had to try!"

traits.locale_text: "An... Müdür... Dostumdu. İsyanı durdurması için onu ikna etmeye çalıştım. Diplomasi çabalarım... Başarısız oldu." {n}Konuşmakta zorlanıyor ama inatla devam ediyor:{/n} "Babam diplomasiden nefret eder. İşte o yüzden... Denemek zorundaydım!"
